means: 使具有生气，使生动( vivify的过去式 )

sentence.Network_en: He looked at her pretty face and it vivified his mental resources.
sentence.Network_cn: 他看着她秀丽的脸蛋,思路变得活跃敏捷起来.

sentence.Network_en: His skillful manipulation vivified this puppet.
sentence.Network_cn: 他熟练的操作让木偶栩栩如生.
